value_i18n.ar_SA:
This campaign in a box is designed for Liferay partners to use in their lead generation efforts. The campaign solution is Liferay Experience Cloud Self-Managed (SM) to solve for B2B Commerce pain points:

  • Cut costs by reducing the need for customization.
  • Improve satisfaction with effortless purchasing.
  • Monitor and increase customer adoption over time.
  • Empower marketing teams to improve customer satisfaction.
  • Refocus sales teams on high-value interactions with top-tier customers.
  • Minimize IT effort for maintaining your digital commerce platform.
